backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with access control, storage mixins, and data models for users, documents, benches, components, and history.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting one logo‑replacement feature and its related components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short functional descriptions used for documentation or build analysis.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V36: Production deployment checklist for Draft V36 detailing environment verification, build prep, and deployment steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind‑based theme definitions using OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/README_PRODUCTION_ENV.md: Documentation of required production environment variables for the frontend, including canister IDs and II configuration.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION_DRAFT_V36: Smoke test script for Draft V36 outlining sign‑in, routing, and profile persistence validation steps.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring public and protected router trees, global providers, and the application shell with error boundary.
Checks if the user is an admin and blocks access with an alert if not.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches render errors and shows a reloadable error alert.
frontend/src/components/auth/ActorGate.t: Ensures backend actor availability, showing loading or error states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Handles Internet Identity authentication, redirecting to sign-in or showing login prompts as needed.
frontend/src/components/dnd/DraggableLis: Generic draggable list component that renders items with drag handlers and visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/dnd/useDraggable: Hook providing state and handlers for reordering items via drag-and-drop.
Main application layout with navigation, header, footer, theme toggle, and sign-out handling.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Scrol: Shows floating buttons to scroll to top or bottom based on scroll position.
frontend/src/components/profile/EntityTa: Input component for selecting or typing a single entity tag with suggestions and removal support.
frontend/src/components/profile/Predefin: Grid selector for choosing from predefined avatar images.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Displays a user avatar from predefined or custom images with optional sizing.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Button that toggles between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
Provides a timestamp-based value to force avatar image cache refreshes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardChartType: Stores and persists the selected dashboard chart type (Bar or Line) in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading via AuthClient.
Periodically notifies the backend of the user's activity by calling updateLastSeen.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as test benches, profiles, and preferences.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides language state, initializes it from backend or localStorage, and syncs updates to the server when authenticated.
frontend/src/i18n/languages.ts: Defines supported languages and helpers for validating and retrieving language labels and flags.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines translation key types used across localized UI text.
frontend/src/i18n/useI18n.ts: Exposes translation function and language state from the I18n context.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for benches, documents, and users using localized text.
frontend/src/pages/Admin/components/Admi: Displays and manages test benches, including listing, loading state, and bench deletion with confirmation dialogs.
Lists documents with metadata and provides download actions with loading and error handling.
Shows the current user's profile, loading states, and preference details within the admin section.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchDetailPa: Displays detailed bench info with components, history, editing, duplication, and deletion workflows.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/BenchListPage: Shows searchable list of benches with loading states and the ability to add new benches.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ad: Modal form for creating a new bench, handling photo upload, metadata, tags, documents, and component duplication.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Be: Editor table for adding, editing, and removing bench components with expiration status handling.
Allows uploading, associating, viewing, and deleting documents linked to a bench, grouped by category.
Displays chronological bench activity history with user info and action details.
Renders a bench photo with loading and error fallback behavior.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Do: UI component for managing document categories and associated files with version inputs.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Du: Dialog allowing users to select benches and duplicate a component to them using API mutations with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ed: Modal for editing bench details including metadata, photo upload, validation, and updating via API.
frontend/src/pages/Benches/components/Ta: Tag input component supporting adding, removing, and selecting suggested tags with filtering.
Placeholder page for creating a new bench, displaying upcoming form features and planned capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard/components/: Pie chart card summarizing components across benches by expiration status using thresholds and i18n labels.
Bar chart showing per‑bench counts of components by expiration status with dynamic thresholds and i18n.
Bar chart grouping components by time‑to‑expiration ranges and displaying counts per range.
Pie chart summarizing documents by category with color‑coded segments and i18n text.
Aggregates component expirations by month and displays them in a bar or line chart.
Counts expired components per bench using profile thresholds and visualizes the results in a bar or line chart.
Computes overall component health percentages and displays them using progress bars.
Defines draggable dashboard statistic and chart cards and initializes their default layout.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the dashboard, loads data for benches, components, and documents, and displays statistics, charts, and reorderable sections.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Manages user profile settings including personal info, expiration preferences, avatars, and language selection.
frontend/src/pages/SignInPage.tsx: Renders the sign-in UI using Internet Identity, handles login state, and redirects authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Users/UserProfileDeta: Displays a public user profile by principal, handling loading, invalid IDs, and missing user data with appropriate UI states.
frontend/src/utils/avatars.ts: Defines a map of avatar IDs to image paths and provides helpers to get avatar paths and list all avatar IDs.
frontend/src/utils/blobUpload.ts: Uploads a file as an ExternalBlob with optional progress tracking.
frontend/src/utils/defaultBenchPhoto.ts: Fetches and converts a default bench placeholder image into an ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Downloads an ExternalBlob as a file by converting its bytes into a browser-triggered download.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes various error formats into user-friendly messages with custom mappings for common backend errors.
frontend/src/utils/expirationSettings.ts: Manages expiration threshold settings with localStorage support and computes expiration status for items.
frontend/src/utils/id.ts: Generates a simple unique ID using timestamp and random string.
frontend/src/utils/rewriteDescription.ts: Heuristically rewrites bench descriptions by normalizing text, capitalization, punctuation, and common abbreviations.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Provides text-based search over test benches by matching query terms against multiple bench fields.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Validates emails, domains, AGILE codes, semantic versions, and URLs with simple client-side rules.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines TailwindCSS config with custom OKLCH color palette, animations, fonts, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Vite’s node environment enabling ESNext modules and including vite.config.ts.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite setup with React plugin, env var injection, path alias, dev server proxy, and build output settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requests, and requirements related to replacing the Safran logo asset.
